hopobject.name: 0xdroid
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.1.6) Gecko/20091215 Ubuntu/10.04 (lucid) Firefox/3.5.6
hopobject.body:
0xlab maintains 0xdroid for advanced Android distributions and attempts to introduce some improvements. Currently, 0xdroid takes Beagleboard as reference hardware. Key Feature:
    Well support for Beagleboard (based on TI OMAP353x SoC) hardware platform (2) Active development and introducing new open source technologies, such as ARM optimizations. (3) Improvements over performance, wireless communications, graphics, multimedia, boot time, etc.
hopobject.shortdesc: 0xlab's enhanced Android distribution, highly tweaked for Beagleboard
